None.Name: Mind Blast
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit projects mental energy that deals 16 damage to enemies in a 10m radius around its target, up to 24 in total.

None.Name: Mind Control
None.Description: Activate to gain permanent control over an enemy unit but kill Parasite Swarm. Restricted to 2 orb creatures with a maximum of 150 power costs. Does not work on extra-large units.
